text: læa phwk khea klaw wa “hak rea ptibati tam næwthang thi thuk txng rwm kab than phwk rea ca thuk chud krachak xxk cak phændin khxng rea” læa rea midi tang hlakhælng kæ phwk khea nı khet hwngham xan plxdphay dxk hrux? Sung phl mi thuk chnid thuk na mayang thi nan pen kheruxng yangchiph thima cak rea tæ swn mak khxng phwk khea miru
